reviews.author: Ashwini & Shrikant
reviews.text: Choosing Weddmac was the best decision we made for our wedding. They didn’t just capture moments — they captured emotions. Every photograph and frame feels honest, timeless, and deeply personal.”

reviews.author: Nikita & Pratik
reviews.text: Nothing felt forced or staged. The team blended in so naturally that we forgot the cameras were even there. Our wedding film still gives us goosebumps every time we watch it

reviews.author: Shivangi & Bhaumik
reviews.text: Weddmac has an incredible eye for detail. From quiet, emotional moments to wild celebrations, everything was captured so beautifully and effortlessly.
